page.title: 18The recollection Mr.Herbet
page.content: { } SCHOOLS IN NEWBRIDGE GREENFIELD INFANTS AND JUNIORS,GREENFIELD CENTRAL SCHOOL AND NEWBRIDGE GRAMMAR SCHOOL.IN MARCH A VOLUNTARY SCHOLARSHIP EXAMINATION WAS HELD.THE MOST ABLE PUPIL IN MY YEAR DID NOT SIT THE EXAMINATION.THE NEXT MOST ABLE PUPIL,TOP OF THE FORM IN THE GRAMMAR SCHOOL,HAD TO LEAVE BECAUSE HIS FATHER HAD DIED AND HE HAD TO GO DOWN THE PIT.THERE WERE NOT MANY CARS. ONLY THE COLLIERY AGENT AND THE DOCTOR HAD ONE.ELLIS WILLIAMS HAD SIX FINE BLACK HORSES,TWO FOR THE HEARSE AND TWO FOR EACH OF THE CARRIAGES.IF PEOPLE WERE POOR THE COFFIN WAS CARRIED TO THE CHURCH AND THEN TO THE CEMETERY.ON WHIT MONDAY ALL THE CHURCHES "WALKED" THE WALKERS MET IN THE SQUARE (OPPOSITE KEN HODGES ELECTRICAL NOW) AN ORGAN WAS PUT { }
